radio_info.short: ParadiseGradio was launched in 2015, with a dynamic nature on the web of webradios, with the aim of changing the page to music. It received
radio_info.rest: awards in 2015 as the 2nd best European station in Europe, but also as the fastest page. Our stream technology is great as our broadcasts become reliable and fast worldwide without delay. The Director of the radio station is Dimitris Konstantinidis, but he is also in the technical part of the station. We hear it everywhere on many online media, but even on Live24 with 24/7 music. This is the world of music, listen and dream in your own musical paradise.
